puzzle.title: Subways
puzzle.hint: You are looking for the names of cities.
Two are in Europe, three in the United States, one in Asia.
In alphabetical order, the cities are: Berlin, New York, Paris, Portland, San Francisco, Tokyo.

puzzle.title: A Transatlantic Flight
puzzle.notes: Clarification: Each page has an area where the overlapping grids form a 3x3 square. (Incidentally, both are on the right side of their page.) The middle box of these should be filled in with black ink; that is, no letter goes in that one middle square.
